product_description: A logo medallion shines on this slingback sandal that takes summery style to greater heights with a jute-wrapped platform wedge.
product_details_and_care:
A logo medallion shines on this slingback sandal that takes summery style to greater heights with a jute-wrapped platform wedge.
4 1/4" heel; 1 1/4" platform
Adjustable slingback strap with buckle closure
Leather upper/synthetic lining/rubber sole
Imported
